text: Panning down this massive dockside facility, the image ch

head_text.subj: THE SAME SCENE ON A 5" PORTABLE VIDEO MONITOR -

text: With one important difference: There's an HNN logo in low
As part of our continuing report on terrorism, we're outside Hong Kong's Aberdeen Harbor nuclear power plant...

shot type: EXT. POWER PLANT, FRONT ENTRANCE, WATERSIDE

text: Two VIDEO CAMERAMEN are shooting an ASIAN HNN REPORTER in middle-aged CHINESE MAN. We don't see the reporter's face "over the shoulder" news angle, he's WEARING A HAT. (There's also HNN BELL JETRANGER HELICOPTER on the ground seemingly empty HNN BOAT moored to a nearby pier.) ASIAN MALE NEWS REPORTER (cont'd)
- Interviewing Mr. David Chin, senior engineer in charge of security. (beat)
Tell me, Mr. Chin: How safe is this plant from a terrorist attack? He holds out a MICROPHONE to Chin.
Totally secure. Without codes, you'd need a missile to blast through the front door; you normally can't even get this close (to the plant) without a full security clearance.
...Could you say that a little closer to the microphone? He pushes the microphone closer to Chin's face:
Of course. You'd need - Suddenly, A PUFF OF WHITE SMOKE EMERGES FROM THE MICROPHO CHIN COLLAPSES. The HNN reporter TAKES OFF HIS HAT: IT'S
(to the guards)
Now! At once, the two cameramen turn: One AIMS his shoulder-mo camera at a SURVEILLANCE CAMERA; the other aims at the FR BOOM! ROCKETS shoot out from their lenses, destroying bot
Let's go! As Yung and the cameramen rush forward -
Harmsway emerges from the boat accompanied by two men car of equipment. He calls back to TWO MEN who have appeared
Get the machine in the water! They begin using a hoist to lift one of the "worms" from (This one looks like an open-mouthed torpedo, with an ant and no flexible tubing attached.)
Yung and the cameramen turn a corner to the reception/sec
What happened out there?
A generator blew. Nothing to worry about. (beat)
But I need one last shot of you. Why don't you stand by the alarm?
No problem. The guard stands, and smiles, posing for the video camera pulls a pistol from his pocket and shoots him.
(to the cameramen)
Up the stairs! They follow Yung up a set of stairs leading to the reacto room. Meanwhile, back at the HNN boat:

Bond is at the porthole, wearing only shorts, trying to f out. He hears the door click open, and - A Guard enters carrying a pile of Bond's clothing with hi top. Stamper is behind him, holding a gun on Sidney.
Put on your clothes. (to the guard)
Cuff him. The guard cuffs Bond's hands (in the front,) and we cut b
Yung and the Cameramen sweep into the control room: Lots soles, with a window overlooking the REACTOR CORE, and it surrounding blue COOLING POOL.
(to the half-dozen engineers)
I'm sorry to interrupt again. But we need one more picture for the story. The engineers ad-lib replies: "Sure." "Okay." Yung smiles
Why don't you line up against the wall? Let's make it a group shot. The engineers line up against a wall. The cameramen take for a massacre. And at the first sound of gunfire, we cut
Stamper is marching Bond and Sidney through the door in h
Sleep well?
Next time, I do the driving. Bond gives her a look.
Harmsway and Yung are locking down at the VIDEO SCREEN of version of the "worm" controller we saw on the SEA DOLPHI
The drill is in the water; approaching the intake tunnel.
Excellent. Harmsway looks up, hearing:
I see you're in your natural element, Harmsway: A room filled with lethal power... (beat)
...With a toxic core at its center. Harmsway smiles at Bond and Sidney, who have entered (han gun point,) with Stamper and a guard. Harmsway is charmin
Do come in Mr. Bond, Sidney... You're just in time for a nuclear meltdown! Coming closer, Sidney struggles against her cuffs, swingi
You bastard - Stamper restrains her, while Bond scans the room for an a He sees a MACHINE PISTOL on the console.
Please, Sidney. I'd like to remember you fondly.
(calling from the console)
Approaching the first gate.
Start the grinders.
The "worm" is nearing an iron sluice gate; the eye closes grinders rev, and it starts to eat through the bars.
...So that's what the weapons grade uranium was for.
Precisely, Mr. Bond. In a matter of minutes, the boring device will arrive at the core of the reactor... (beat)
And when the radioactive blades cut into the plutonium -
- Instant melt-down.
Chernobyl will look like a campfire. Young calls out again, with a hint of urgency. Bond decid rattling Harmsway - so he can move Closer to the gun, unn
We're through the first gate. Approaching the second -
(demanding)
Why, Harmsway? Wasn't stealing the gold enough?
(to Yung)
Bore through. (to Bond, chuckling)
...They used to say living well was the best revenge, Mr. Bond. (beat)
They're wrong. (beat)
Revenge is the best revenge.
Entering the main tunnel - ten minutes to target -
(fiercely)
What could you possibly have to be vengeful for, Harmsway? Still trying to prove yourself to daddy? This infuriates Harmsway. Bond moves closer to the gun.
Hong Kong, Mr. Bond!
You have to leave -
(enraged, ignoring Yung)
A hundred and fifty years ago, my ancestors took this island - a barren, lifeless rock - and turned it into the greatest city known to modern civilization. (beat)
And now that I'm being forced to give it back, I intend to return it in exactly the same condition: A barren, lifeless rock. (beat)
The gold is merely reparations - payment from the spineless British government who wouldn't listen.
(to Sidney, glancing at the gun)
... I think Uncle Elliot is having his own melt-down.
Approaching the third gate -
Smash through it! (then)
Laugh all you'd like, Mr. Bond - but you fit perfectly in to my plans. (he reaches for a newspaper)
Here. This just in. Newsflash. Read all about it. He thrusts an issue of TOMORROW at Bond, holding the top Bond reads THE HEADLINES, sourly:
... Hong Kong destroyed by nuclear meltdown... British agent found in reactor suspected of sabotage; Harmsway calls for British government to resign. Harmsway smiles at Bond:
...As the advertising says: Tomorrow never lies.
What about the gold?
You must go. Now. Otherwise the boat won't be out of range - Stamper and the guard appear nervous, itching to leave -
Thirty seconds. (then, to Bond)

That's the most brilliant part of the plan, Mr. Bond: To save the economy, I'll let the new British government - my British government - announce that the gold was irradiated in Hong Kong - where no one will be able to touch it for a hundred years. (beat)
And just by coincidence: He turns the paper over and reads/reveals a smaller headl
...Gold mine opens in Vietnam. (turns to Stamper)
Let's go. Put them in the airlock. Stamper moves towards Bond and Sidney. Bond edges closer
You'll never get away with it, Harmsway. Too many people know. Bond tenses, ready to spring -
Who, Mr. Bond? The kooks - the crazies - the conspiracy theorists? The Oliver Stones of the world? (pausing, then, with great scorn:)
I'll publish their books, I'll make their movies, I'll put them on my TV shows! (beat)
They're my bellboys. They carry my luggage. Bond moves, but - the guard picks up the gun!!! Bond frow
Now. Get them in the airlock. Fortunately, Bond has a back-up plan. As Stamper hustles
One problem, Harmsway: The girl. And the handcuffs. They'll give it away. Harmsway considers this for a second. Sidney takes Bond's

No. I want to stay with him. Bond looks at her. He's surprised: In the blink of an eye realizes he's developed feelings for her. He knows that i hold her, he'd kiss her, and whisper "You're a hell of a But at the same instant - throwing a glance at Yung - he running out of time against the worm, and is better off a
(breaking the moment, cynically)
How sweet.
(satto, to Bond)
My timing always was lousy.
(cold and hard)
I'd rather die alone.
Take the girl. Leave the handcuffs. We'll drown her at sea.
(to Bond, sarcastically)
Enjoy the rest of your life. As Stamper pushes Bond into the reactor room airlock, he
I'll meet you on the boat, south of Lantau Island.
The door closes. Bond looks out the small window at:

head_text.subj: HARMSWAY AND YUNG IN THE CONTROL ROOM -

text: Take the men. I can finish alone.
(to the technicians and cameramen)
You come with me - (to the guard who handcuffed Bond)
You stay here. As they exit -

Bond has yanked his shoes off. He pulls out the PLASTIQUE SHOELACES and opens the SECRET COMPARTMENT IN HIS HEEL, r DETONATOR, and EAR PLUGS. Moving quickly, Bond BITES OFF a 2-inch piece of shoelace it around the chain-link connecting his handcuffs, while.
Yung sits down at the worm control and explains to the gu
We'll cut through the last gate, then set it on auto-pilot. He starts to maneuver the joystick, and -
The worm turns a corner. We see -
100 feet ahead: An iron gate. Beyond it, the blue lights reactor cooling pool... And beyond that... THE REACTOR CO shimmering silver target. Meanwhile, back outside, at -
Water sprays violently as the HNN boat thunders out of Ab harbor with Harmsway at the helm. Junks and sampans are t his wake, as

Bond finishes pressing the SHOELACES AROUND THE DOOR LOCK TURNS UP HIS SHIRT COLLAR TO PULL OUT A WIRE that's been inside. He connects it between the explosive on the handcuff chai detonator, then steals a glance out the window at:
still guiding the worm with the joy stick. His eyes are f
Where Yung sees the gate looming ahead on the video scree presses a nearby button marked "START GRINDERS"... And th goes black, replaced by the words "GRINDERS ENGAGED."
The worm bares its lethal teeth; and revs up to speed. Me
Closes his eyes, presses the detonator, and -
HEARS a small BOOM from inside the airlock.
(to the guard)
Check it out. Be careful. The guard picks up his machine pistol, starts to the door
Bond (with his hands now free) is quickly rewiring the de the plastique explosive around the door handle.
The worm's teeth are beginning to cut into the steel bars THE GUARD APPROACHES THE DOOR. BOND BRACES HIMSELF INSIDE THE AIRLOCK.

head_text.subj: THE GUARD PEERS INTO THE WINDOW -

text: And suddenly... BOOM! The door blows open with a shatteri

The guard is blasted backward, dead. Bond rolls out, scra the weapon. Yung slams his hand on a button marked "AUTO- caption appears on the video screen "TARGET LOCKED," and As Bond grabs the gun, bringing it up to shoot, Yung dive him. They struggle, and the gun skitters across the floor the window overlooking the blue cooling pool. Breaking free, Bond moves around a console for the gun. Y shortcut - leaping on, and then over the console, as -
Chews through the last of the iron bars, and glides throu toward THE SILVERY REACTOR CORE, 35 feet ahead.

have squared off in a short, brutal MARTIAL ARTS battle. (The fight takes place in the space between the consoles reactor core window; the gun, lies on the ground between They trade punch after punch - and although Bond is holdi Yung is every bit his equal. Backing off, Bond spins into a crescent kick - But Yung catches Bond's foot, and shoves Bond backwards, against a wall near a FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Meanwhile, all through this... THE WORM IS GETTING CLOSER TO THE CORE.

As Yung reaches down for the gun, Bond grabs the fire ext from the wall. He rushes Yung, blasting him with CO2. In the white smoke, Yung drops the gun... Then CHARGES at headbutting him, twisting, and turning 007... SMASHING BO BACKWARDS AGAINST THE GLASS WINDOW. THE WINDOW SHATTERS. Bond is winded. And as he struggles himself from falling backwards into the reactor room... Yung does a FLYING, FEET FIRST KICK to finish the job - But at the last second, BOND DUCKS, reaches up, and uses momentum to send him flying over Bond's head into - THE REACTOR ROOM. He sails through the air, heading for the cooling pool 20 THE WORM CLOSES IN ON THE SILVER REACTOR CORE.

head_text.subj: SCREAMING, YUNG HITS THE WATER FEET FIRST, AND -
THE WORM BURROWS IN ON HIM.

text: Bond races to hit the "EMERGENCY REACTOR SHUT DOWN" butto a FIRE ALARM, disconnects the worm, and sets off an "EMER DECONTAMINATION" system, spraying the room with a mist of Finally, Bond retrieves the gun, and pauses to look down
There's a cloud of RED in the middle of the blue water.
Bond goes to the dead guard. Gets the key, removes his ha bracelets, then hoists the dead guard over his shoulder,
With the sound of fire engines approaching in the backgro straps the dead guard into the passenger seat, and takes

The HNN boat has pulled alongside the Sea Dolphin II. The the nuke plant is boarding the larger boat. (Note: From the air, we should notice that the "gold hold covered by a steel hatch, and the biggest worm is stored hanging from a steel boom.)
Coming up the ladder first, Harmsway is greeted by the Ca
Any news?
The call just went out on the Hong Kong police radio: Fire at the power plant.
(ironically)
Alert the media! Stamper and Sidney have climbed onto the deck.
What do you want me to do with her?
- Can't we make a deal? I won't say anything -
(touching her cheek)
You're so cute, my dear. (beat)
But I'm afraid not. (to one of the cameramen)
Put her in the storage room. The cameraman takes her away. Harmsway turns to the capta
We'll get rid of her when we're in International waters. (then)
Set sail, full speed, due south. I'll be in my cabin. Let me know when Mr. Yung arrives. We'll break out the champagne.
Near the engine room (indicating we're near the bottom of the cameraman opens a door to a small, cramped room with SCUBA EQUIPMENT. He pushes Sidney inside.
Don't get any ideas. Then locks the door on her.
Several hundred feet in the air, the helicopter is headin island in the distance.
Bond checks the compass, and adjusts his course. The COMP DUE SOUTH.
The helicopter clears the island: Bright blue sea ahead. then passes over - the HNN boat, bobbing empty in the wat Then, further ahead, he spots the stern of Sea Dolphin II in the instance.
Looking north, off the back of the boat Stamper and a cre helicopter - a tiny speck in the air.
There it is. Stamper lifts a pair of BINOCULARS for confirmation.
He sees two figures in the cockpit.
Stamper picks up his radio:
It's him. They both made it.
The Captain replies:
I'll tell Sir Elliot.
Harmsway is working at a computer. A chime sounds.
Yes?
He's approaching from the north, sir.
Fantastic. Invite the crew on deck to celebrate, and I'll be up in a few minutes.
Bond is about two miles out from the stern of the Sea Dol Maybe 500' in the air. Taking the machine pistol from the dead guard's lap, he o small pilot's window, and balances it on his knees. Ahead
The crewmen are lining up on either side of the landing p ship's railings.
Ready for war. He pushes the cyclic pitch lever forward, Bell Jetranger goes into a screaming descent.
Champagne bottles pop. Stamper is with a crewman, who loo the chopper, about 1000' off the stern:
He seems to be coming in awfully fast. Stamper picks up his binoculars.
He sees Bond.
Get the guns! It's not him! It's Bond!!! He might have also added "It's too late," as -

Bond SWOOPS IN LOW on the port side of the boat, FIRING H the pilot's window, and using the CHOPPER'S BLADES to thr men on deck. About half of them DIVE INTO THE WATER FOR SAFETY, only t left behind. Flying up the port side toward the front of the boat, Bon
The windows rattle as Bond's chopper thunders by. Perplex Harmsway stands, opens the porthole curtains. He cranes h but sees nothing. He presses an intercom button:
What the hell is going on?
(on a phone)
I don't know sir - The helicopter suddenly appears in front of him. Shooting pilot's window, Bond shatters the glass windows - And the Captain slumps forward on the wheel, spinning it to the deck.
The boat pitches wildly; Harmsway looses his balance, cra wall.
Sidney is thrown from her bench, slamming against scuba t
Stamper bounces himself, handing out AUTOMATIC WEAPONS fr cache hidden inside a DINGHY. The two cameramen take their M-16's and rush forward, jum some machinery to climb onto -
They rush forward, and assume positions shooting at Bond.
Taking hits. Bond pivots and turns the chopper, heading s them.
The men turn, and start to run as the chopper chases them

head_text.subj: BOND HOOKS BOTH OF THEM WITH THE SKIDS, BY THE BACK OF TH

text: SHIRTS!!!!   The man are flailing like crazy as -

head_text.subj: BOND PULLS BACK ON THE CYCLIC PITCH LEVER -
THE HELICOPTER REARS BACKWARDS, AND UP -

text: And the men burst through their shirt buttons, FALLING, S into the sea.
Bond pushes the cyclic sideways to bank down, and in, on But he doesn't see -
A SMALL ROCKET STREAKING UPWARD from the boat. Stamper is shoulder mounted launcher.
BOOM! It hits the engine.
The gauges go crazy; the alarms go berserk. The entire co chattering as Bond struggles to remain in control.
HARMSWAY is trying to make his way up the ladder as the b continues to veer out of control. He pauses to look up at
Bond forces the cyclic forward. The helicopter pitches fo
He's heading straight for the hatch covering the gold hol is left alive is diving off the ship to get out of the wa
Struggling with the wheel, Harmsway picks up the radio:
What the hell is going on?
It's Bond!
Kill him! Finish it!
With the worm dangling from a boom in the background, he

With the chopper about 15 feet above the gold hold - just under control - Bond opens the door. He leaps out onto the hatch, and rolls off, disappearing THE CHOPPER CRASHES onto the gold hold, in a GIANT BALL O twisted metal.
Sidney looks up, hearing and feeling the explosion.
Harmsway regains control of the boat; he TAKES A GUN from captain, and pushes the body out.

With FLAMING DEBRIS still falling around him, Bond is ste moving down a passageway toward the front of the ship. (Bond has two goals in mind at this point: First, to neut threats, and second, to save Sidney if she's still alive. Arriving at a BULKHEAD DOOR, Bond checks both directions passageway, then pokes his head inside - And is SUDDENLY YANKED BACKWARDS, OUT INTO THE PASSAGEWAY against a railing. Bond looks up: STAMPER stands with a smile on his face. One arm is raise head, grasping the WORM on the swinging boom. The worm is to the boom by a thin metal cable.

You're mine now. Bond rushes at Stamper, slamming into him. The man doesn' With his free hand, he grabs Bond by his shirt, and throw against a steel wall. Bond crashes to the deck. As Bond recovers, Stamper (still smiling) presses a RED B wall, and THE WORM comes to life. Stamper closes in on Bond with the worm. Bond tries to stand, but Stamper flings him back down, pi against the wall with his free hand as he - MANEUVERS THE WORM TOWARDS BOND'S HEAD. With the cutting blades whirring inches away from Bond's

I'm going to do this slowly - Bond executes a scissor kick to Stamper's ankles. Stamper sideways. Bond rolls away from the worm - But by the time Bond gets to his feet, Stamper has recove rushing at Bond full force, with the worm. Stamper thrusts the worm at Bond once. Bond ducks. The wo into the wall. Pulling the device back, Stamper thrusts a second time - action,) then a third (same action) - still missing Bond.
With all the yanking and pulling, a loop of slack has dev the cable, on the ground.
Stamper is about to attack Bond a fourth time when Bond k the groin. Stamper doubles over in pain - And the worm FLIES OUT OF HIS HAND, swinging on the boom SIDE OF THE SHIP.
The grinders propel the worm forward, into the hull.
Hears a strange vibrating sound from the wall.
(barking into the radio)
Stamper! Report in!
As Stamper straightens up, winded from the groin kick -
(continuing, on Stamper's radio)

Report to the bridge! BOND rushes to A SMALL PILE OF SLACK CABLE, which is rapi taught as the worm wends its way underwater. Stamper rushes Bond - And in one lightening fast move, Bond wraps the cable twi Stamper's neck. Suddenly THE CABLE TIGHTENS, and - STAMPER soars 15 in the air, HANGING BY HIS NECK, as -
THE WORM BURSTS THROUGH THE WALL! A torrent of water floo pushing Sidney off to one side.
It's zooming at the door!
The door bursts open, sending tons of water into the pass
The boat shudders violently, sending Harmsway crashing ag wall, cutting his head.
As the boat rocks, Bond steadies himself, then starts for using the same route as the cameramen lifted by the chopp First climbing up on some machinery, then up onto the bri
Sidney is thrashing for air, with only a few inches left rising water and the ceiling.
3/4 filled with water. Rising fast.

The worm is heading for a door. We see the door disintegr front of us, as the worm bursts into - THE ENGINE ROOM. With the water cascading over the camera, (as if we were inside an ocean wave,) the worm heads for a tank marked "
The boat is sinking. Bond is running across the bridge ro THE BOAT SUDDENLY LISTS TO THE STARBOARD SIDE.

Harmsway is thrown backwards. Gun in hand, he makes his w incline, to the port-side door. Just when he thinks he's made it - Bang. Bond appears in the doorway, having jumped down fro on the small exterior walkway. He's seething with rage. Harmsway looks up at him. Blinks in disbelief.
I never believe what I read in the newspapers. Harmsway slowly brings up the gun.
Pity you'll miss your obituary. Bond smacks the gun out of his hand with contempt. Moves
Where is she, Harmsway? BOOM! The fuel tanks explode in the distance. The bridge violently; the room tilts to a greater angle.
You want to kill me, Bond? Go ahead. With both arms, Bond pushes Harmsway backwards, flinging against the starboard wall. The water is rising on the br
(moving in on him)
Where is she Harmsway? - He grabs Harmsway by the lapels, and throws him against t wall, crashing onto the instrument panel head first. Harmsway laughs maniacally, face down on the gauges:
What is it, Bond? You haven't the guts? Boom! There's another explosion in the background! The fr boat tilts upward! The water is rushing in! Bond grabs Harmsway by the shoulder -
You spineless paper tiger - And yanks him off the instrument panel, flinging him back against the rear wall of the bridge.
Where is she, Harmsway?!? Or did you kill her like Paris? Suddenly, THE BOAT GROANS. The BRIDGE RISES OUT OF THE WA BOND loses his balance, FALLING ONTO HARMSWAY -
(glaring, insanely:)
We all go down together!!! Harmsway lunges for Bond's throat -

Where Bond breaks Harmsway's grasp in a violent struggle punches him. Air bubbles break from Harmsway's mouth. He frantically tries to break free for the surface - But Bond pulls him back down, and holds him down, pushing Harmsway's shoulders. Harmsway is thrashing about, flailing in all directions, Bond in a haze of bubbles... Then falls still. With his lungs aching, bursting with fire, Bond rockets u
through the bridge windows, up to - THE SURFACE. He breaks through the water, gasping for air... And then, instantly, dives down again.

Bond dives for the boat - down, and down, chasing it, as just grab it, and stop it from sinking. He goes deeper, and deeper, as it sinks further and furth just beyond his reach. And just when it seems impossible for him to survive - to breath a second longer - A FIGURE IN SCUBA GEAR (mask and tank) GRABS HIM. Bond turns in disbelief. Stares into the mask: IT'S SIDNE puts her regulator in Bond's mouth... And they share the air as they rise from the depths.
They break through the water. Sidney yanks off her mask.
What do you mean, you'd rather die alone?
I didn't say when I want to die - She splashes him. Turning away, Bond spots Stamper's 'arm dinghy floating nearby.
Bond climbs into it, then helps Sidney get in. They colla bottom of the boat, resting their heads against the gunwa After a beat, SIDNEY CLEARS HER THROAT. Bond is already a
Before we go any further here, Mr. Bond, from Lloyds of London, I just want to get two things straight.
... Yes?
First, that boat is in international waters. I'm claiming it for salvage. One-third of that gold is mine.
And number two?
If you think we're going to have some kind of 'life affirming' romance here just because we cheated death, let me be clear: (pause)
We're going to have it where I want, and when I want.
And when might that be?
Now. He laughs. She falls into his arms. They kiss, and we cut
With the dinghy reflected in the glass. In unison, they a lowered, revealing Q and Wade.
... As usual, I see the situation is in 007's very capable hands.
Life is not fair.
(emphatically)
You're right. A British naval officer appears.
Excuse me, Major Boothroyd - the message went to London.
Thank you. Q and Wade throw a glance back to the sea, then turn, wak
Tell me, Q-ster. You do ever do any gardening?
...The only thing I ever planted was bugs.

head_text.subj: A PICTURE OF HARMSWAY ON A VIDEO SCREEN -

text: On the wall behind M's DESK. It's night. Moneypenny sits from M, with a steno pad.
Moneypenny, take the following release: (beat)
The body of Sir Elliot Harmsway was found floating in the South China Sea this morning, at 08:00 hours local Hong Kong time. (pauses)
At present, local authorities believe the media mogul committed suicide.
Bond and Sidney break off a kiss. She lies nestled in his
James... Is this really what a typical day is like for you? Bond replies with a wry smile:
Yes... (pause)

But some days... Are longer than others. And with this, he reaches up over his head, and pulls a t two of them... And the camera pulls back, and up, rising into the air to The entire British Navy closing in on them from all point compass.
(save for one last line:) James Bond will return.
